attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review:
This app slowed down my phone, making it unusable. It took up more storage than my 2000+ pictures. This is the worst piece of software I’ve ever come in contact with. 
It’s absolute garbage. 
I would give it 0 stars if I could.

attributes.title: ✨orange✨
attributes.review: okay so when i downloaded this app to support the 🍊orange🍊my sister turned 🍊orange🍊we found out that she has ✨orangrites diabetic✨ and then she morphed into and 🍊orange🍊and she started talking in ✨orangenees✨soon my family started to hang up lgbtq flags around my house and they turned into the ✨trump 2020✨ flag and then someone stepped on my sister and she ✨died ✨once she died all i could see was orange and 😩i started to turn orange😩 and that’s how i turned into the 🤠annoying orange🤠

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: It took 16 hours to download and it sign me up for stuff I did not want to be apart of like I just wanted to know what Trump is about but instead I got so many emails from Trump and his family and Vice President like what the heak it really made me mad

attributes.title: Not Cool
attributes.userName: I don't know what to puthere 1
attributes.review: It wants your phone number to register and by entering it you consent to receiving calls and texts. There’s no indication that you will ever be given the option to STOP receiving calls and texts. Overall pretty sketchy.

attributes.title: Garbage
attributes.review: Bugs, slow load times, no information, poor user interface, needs major improvement.

attributes.title: trash
attributes.review: i’ve tried to download this app FOUR TIMES but it kept crashing and my phone was heating up for some strange reason?? all i wanted to see was our amazing presidents plans for our future. ridiculous!!! trump 2020 ❤️✨🧚🏼

attributes.title: Horrible app 🚨🚨
attributes.review: I opened this app on my phone and was shocked at the image that popped up. In turn, I dropped my phone and cracked the screen because of this horrifying image. 12/10 do not recommend. Do not waste your time.

attributes.title: Full of lies
attributes.review: So I downloaded it to see what plans trump had and the rallies he was holding and it was full of lies! Blacks for trump?? I think not! Women for trump?? Nope really women don’t vote for a disgusting man like him!!! This app should be taken down for the absolute misinformation it has!!! Disgusting utterly disgusting!!!

attributes.title: Do not get this app
attributes.review:
This is by top the worst app I have ever used it is very very slow it tells me to reload every time I try to login. The app glitches me out every time I try to use it. 
This app is just a waste of space!!
